availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John B. Burton (Daviess County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, farmer. Ohio County, Kentucky, native. Son of James Burton and Susan Ward Burton. Married to Sarah Lashbrook Burton in Daviess County, Kentucky, on May 12, 1859. Father of Florence Burton, Electa Burton, and Joseph S. Burton. Farmer in Daviess County in 1850. Farmer in Daviess County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 1, p. 359B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 2, p. 888.
History of Daviess County, Kentucky (Chicago: Inter-State Publishing Co., 1883), 671.
"John B Burton (1830-1911)," Find A Grave, Memorial 117305002, accessed November 18, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/117305002.
